Strings.String:
[format][color:#edc300FF]{0}[/format] {1}Using cheats prevents you from earning achievements and autosaves are disabled.
Would you still like to activate this cheat?
Join the Saints Row Community at SaintsRow.com
Here you can create a new THQ ID or link your gamer profile to an existing one.
The Gamertag you're using is already linked to a THQ ID.
The Gamertag you're using is linked to a different THQ ID.
Your gamertag is not linked with a THQ ID.
We found a THQ ID associated with your Gamertag. Please login to your existing account.

Upload your first character to earn an achievement.
Browse characters online and play with them in game.
Participate in challenges to earn in-game content.
Track community activity on the real-time community map and view your own personalized map.
Receive community-only deals on Saints Row merchandise and game content.
Your current gamer profile was successfully linked to your THQ ID.
Your co-op partner is using cheats. Any new save games created will have cheats enabled. Autosaving has been disabled and you will not be able to earn any more achievements.
Your co-op partner is using cheats. Any new save games created will have cheats enabled. Autosaving has been disabled and you will not be able to earn any more achievements.
Saving Gamer profile. Please do not turn off your console or remove your storage device.
Quick Match was unable to find any connectable games.
This gamer profile is unable to play on Xbox LIVE. Please check your Family Settings or obtain an Xbox LIVE Gold Membership.
You have been disconnected from Xbox LIVE.
A sign-in change has occurred. You have been returned to the title screen.
You must be signed in with a gamer profile to save your game and earn achievements. Would you like to sign in?
Multiple players per console is not supported.
Connection to Xbox LIVE lost. Returning to Title Screen.
You must be signed in to a gamer profile to use System Link.
You must be signed in to Xbox LIVE to use this feature. Sign in?
You are not currently signed in with a gamer profile. Sign in?
You must be signed in to Xbox LIVE to use this feature.
You must enable the vibration option in the Personal Settings of your gamer profile.
When the following appears do not turn off your console or remove your storage device.
The current device is full. Please select a different device to save.
Importing content. Please don't turn off your console.
Loading content. Please don't turn off your console.
You will lose all progress if you sign in with a gamer profile.
The Save Process has failed because the default Storage Device is no longer available.
There is not enough free space on the default Storage Device to complete the Save process.
Saving content. Please don't turn off your console.
Please do not turn off your console or remove your storage device.
This game uses an auto save feature. In order to save, you must be signed into a gamer profile.
Your stats were damaged and must be reset. This will not affect any Achievements you may have earned.
The gamer profile does not have permission to access Member Content. Please check your Family Settings
